name: Konverter4MeizuM6
short_description: Convert your videos for Meizu M6 without leaving your Linux Desktop. konverter4meizu is implemented over the shoulders of Kommander to simplify the use of the power of mencoder. Not installation/root privileges needed... only install and have fun!!
